Winter's Raven.name: Winter's Raven
Winter's Raven.flavor: As an enemy aims at you, your raven unfurls as a shroud of bitter wind that deflects the attack.
Winter's Raven.trigger: An enemy within 5 squares of you targets you with a ranged attack.
Winter's Raven.target: The triggering enemy in the burst
Winter's Raven.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom or Charisma modifier cold damage.
Winter's Raven.effect: If your shadow raven familiar is present, it appears adjacent to the target in active mode. The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

An Unkindness of Ravens.name: An Unkindness of Ravens
An Unkindness of Ravens.flavor: Your shadow raven splinters into a dozen distinct shapes, attacking your enemies with deathly cold.
An Unkindness of Ravens.range: Close burst 3 centered on you or your shadow raven
An Unkindness of Ravens.attack: Wisdom or Charisma vs. Reflex. If the target is bloodied or undead, you gain a +2 power bonus to the attack roll.
An Unkindness of Ravens.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom or Charisma modifier cold and necrotic damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
An Unkindness of Ravens.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).

Raven Harrier.name: Raven Harrier
Raven Harrier.flavor: Your shadow raven flies shrieking into combat at your command, distracting a foe to grant you the advantage.
Raven Harrier.requirement: Your shadow raven familiar must be in active mode.
Raven Harrier.effect: One creature adjacent to your shadow raven familiar grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
